alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 28 at 5:58AM EDT until September 29 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Up to 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Richmond (Staten Island) and Kings (Brooklyn) Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of localized minor coastal flooding are possible during the times of high tide this weekend.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
